intro_only_event_multi_timeattack_intro_: Oh, there you are! We were looking for you!

Did you hear? Now we can have time trials!
You’re gonna give them a try, aren’t you?
Speed is where it’s at for those battles!

I’m gonna blast through the competition with 
my partner Pokémon in no time with a combination
that’s better than perfect!

Musharna and I don’t plan to lose, either! It’ll be
great if we can have lots of Pokémon battles!

I like the Battle Subway a lot, but these time trials
here on Pasio sound like a lot of fun!

Yeah! I wonder if we’ll meet some new sync
pairs! I’m so excited!
